response.overview: Politics and crime have been an integral part of Hajduk for decades. The club was destroyed over the years and served as a training ground for politicians and interest groups to realize their private, business and political interests through Hajduk. In 2008, Hajduk got a chance for a new start, but politics once again destroyed the club and brought it to the brink of bankruptcy. Torcida enters the scene. After the struggle for the Code, Torcida founded the association Our Hajduk in 2011, and the members became the foundation for a democratic and transparent Hajduk.
response.title: Naš Hajduk: Projekt jedne ljubavi
